alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 12:20AM CDT until August 11 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BLUE EARTH COUNTY... At 1219 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pemberton, or 14 miles southeast of Mankato, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Blue Earth County, including the following locations... Skyline and Minneopa State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
